title: Megadeth - Siara Hall, Fortaleza, Brazil (2016-08-13), AUD, NTSC
description:
2016-08-13
Dystopia World Tour
Siara Hall, Fortaleza, Ceara, Brazil
1h32min

Audience record
DVD got on a trade -> DVD Decrypter -> You
Taper: RASL Videos (http://rasl.info/videolist)

Specifications: 
DUal Layer DVD
Basic menu chapters
Video MPEG-2 8312kbps
Audio LCPM 1536kb/s 48000Hz
720x480 (16:9)
29.970fps

Setlist: 
01. Intro: Prince of Darkness / Hangar 18 **
02. The Threat Is Real
03. Tornado of Souls
04. Poisonous Shadows
05. Wake Up Dead
06. In My Darkest Hour ***
07. Conquer or Die!
08. Fatal Illusion
09. She-Wolf
10. Dawn Patrol
11. Poison Was the Cure
12. Sweating Bullets
13. A Tout Le Monde
14. Trust
15. Post American World
16. Dystopia
17. Symphony of Destruction
18. Peace Sells

Encore
19. Holy Wars... The Punishment Due



Taper's notes: 
The show was recorded about 30 meters from the stage, on the left side of the soundboard, the camera was stabled on one of the tables of the soundboard team, but the pression of the sound was shaking the camera, difficulting maintain the camera's focus stable, and sometimes, I had to film on my hands.

**The playback on the big screen of the intro of "Prince of Darkness" froze, and the intro was interrupted, then, the band starts "Hangar 18" song.
***During the song "In my darkest hour" the camera's battery discharged, and I had to change the battery, then, this song is incomplete.

Lineage: Nikon S8100, Full HD mode, NTSC
DVD authored on "TMPGEnc Authoring Works 4"
